description: The CMS 2010 BSA SNF Beneficiary PUF originates from a 5% simple random sample of beneficiaries drawn (without replacement) from the 100% Beneficiary Summary File for reference year 2010. The sample that is used for the CMS 2010 BSA SNF Beneficiary PUF is disjoint from the existing 5% CMS research sample in the sense that there is no overlap in terms of the beneficiaries in the CMS 2010 BSA SNF Beneficiary PUF and the 5% CMS research sample.

name: 2010 Basic Stand Alone Skilled Nursing Facility Beneficiary PUF
